---
category: news
title: "IIT-G develops deep learning-based framework to assess knee OA severity from X-ray images"
excerpt: "Guwahati, has developed a deep learning (DL)-based framework that automatically assesses the severity of knee osteoarthritis (OA) from X-ray images. The AI-based model, named called OsteoHRNet, can be used to detect the severity level of OA and assist medical practitioners remotely for a more accurate diagnosis,"
